translated: They live a holy life in order to be reborn in the heavens or in some divine realm, and they give up their training and engage in sexual activity. They have broken their moral discipline, are rotten on the inside, and have become impure.

original: shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa dang / lung bong ltar kun tu spyod cing dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba yin te /
analyzed: shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa dang / lung bong ltar kun tu spyod cing dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba yin te /
translated: He is like a rotten tree, like a hare, and though he is not a spiritual practitioner, he claims to be a spiritual practitioner.

original: rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams su yang de kho na bzhin du rab tu byung ba yin par rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams su yang de kho na bzhin du rab tu byung ba yin par rigs par bya'o //
translated: You should understand that the person who is not of the spiritual lineage is just like that in the past, present, and future.

original: bslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag gi rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: bslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag gi rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po ma yin no //
translated: The going forth and the state of a fully ordained monk in the case of a person who does not want to train are not genuine.

original: de'i phyir rnam grangs de dang bsam pa des na de'i de ni don gyi sgo nas rab tu byung bam yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam grangs de dang bsam pa des na de'i de ni don gyi sgo nas rab tu byung bam yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, by this explanation and by this intention, that going forth is not a genuine going forth in the sense of the meaning of the term.

original: rab tu byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs 'dzin pa tsam gyis rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba kho na zad de /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs 'dzin pa tsam gyis rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba kho na zad de /
translated: It is only a going forth in the sense of the verbal convention that is used to describe it, and it is only a going forth in the sense of the mere adoption of the outward physical signs of a monk.

original: de ni rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag gi rtags lnga pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag gi rtags lnga pa yin te /
translated: This is the fifth mark of the person who is not of the spiritual lineage.

original: gzhan yang rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag ni lus sam ngag gam yid kyi dge ba'i las gang cung zad ci @8b byed kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag ni lus sam ngag gam yid kyi dge ba'i las gang cung zad ci @8b byed kyang rung ste /
translated: Moreover, whatever virtuous karma a person abiding in the lineage of no lineage creates, whether physical, verbal or mental,

original: de thams cad srid pa'i bsam pa'i phyir te phyi ma la yang 'byung ba'i srid pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'dod phyir ram /
analyzed: de thams cad srid pa'i bsam pa'i phyir te phyi ma la yang 'byung ba'i srid pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'dod phyir ram /
translated: all of that is for the sake of existence, for the sake of higher rebirth,

original: longs spyod kyi bsam ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: longs spyod kyi bsam ba'i phyir te /
translated: or for the sake of resources,

original: longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa dga' 'dod pa'i phyir byed pa yin te /
analyzed: longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa dga' 'dod pa'i phyir byed pa yin te /
translated: for the sake of higher resources.

original: de ni rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag gi rtags drug pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rigs med pa la gnas pa'i gang zag gi rtags drug pa yin no //
translated: This is the sixth sign of a person abiding in the lineage of no lineage.🔽There are many signs like this that indicate a person who is not destined for nirvana,

original: gang dag dang ldan na yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can gyi gang zag la 'di ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can gyi gang zag yin no zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de'i rtags ni de lta bu dang mthun🔽pa mang du yod do //
analyzed: gang dag dang ldan na yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can gyi gang zag la 'di ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can gyi gang zag yin no zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de'i rtags ni de lta bu dang mthun🔽pa mang du yod do //
translated: so that one can say, “This person is not destined for nirvana.”

original: de la rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the persons who are endowed with the lineage?

original: smras pa / rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag ni rigs la gnas pa kho na yin la /🔽ma zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yang yod do /
analyzed: smras pa / rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag ni rigs la gnas pa kho na yin la / ma zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yang yod do /
translated: It is said: The person who is endowed with the lineage is only one who is endowed with the lineage.🔽There is one who is endowed with the lineage but has not entered and has not definitely emerged.

original: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yang yod do //
analyzed: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yang yod do //
translated: There is one who is endowed with the lineage, has entered but has not definitely emerged.

original: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par 'byung ba yang yod do //
analyzed: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par 'byung ba yang yod do //
translated: There is one who is endowed with the lineage, has entered and has definitely emerged.

original: dbang po rtul po dang / dbang po 'bring po dang / dbang po rnon po dang / 'dod chags spyad pa dang / zhe sdang spyad pa dang / gti mug spyad pa dang / mi khom par skyes pa dang / khom par skyes pa dang /
analyzed: dbang po rtul po dang / dbang po 'bring po dang / dbang po rnon po dang / 'dod chags spyad pa dang / zhe sdang spyad pa dang / gti mug spyad pa dang / mi khom par skyes pa dang / khom par skyes pa dang /
translated: There is one who is endowed with the lineage, has entered and has definitely emerged, but who is of dull faculty, middling faculty, or sharp faculty, who engages in desire, who engages in hatred, who engages in delusion, who is born in a nonleisurely state, who is born in a leisurely state,

original: bag med pa dang ldan pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa dang / log par zhugs pa dang / log pa ma yin par zhugs pa dang / bsgribs pa dang / yun ring ba dang / thag nye ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa dang /
analyzed: bag med pa dang ldan pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa dang / log par zhugs pa dang / log pa ma yin par zhugs pa dang / bsgribs pa dang / yun ring ba dang / thag nye ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa dang /
translated: who is endowed with heedlessness, who is endowed with heedfulness, who has entered wrongly, who has entered rightly, who is obscured, who is distant, who is near, who is unripened,

original: yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa dag kyang yod do //
translated: There are those who are not fully matured, those who are not completely pure, and those who are completely pure.

original: de la rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag rigs la gnas pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: de la rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag rigs la gnas pa kho na yin na /
translated: What is a person who is only situated in the spiritual lineage?

original: ma zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: ma zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who is situated in the spiritual lineage but has not entered the stages and has not attained certainty?

original: 'di ltar 'di na gang zag la la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis bon dang ldan pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di na gang zag la la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis bon dang ldan pa kho na yin na /
translated: Here a person possesses the seed of the supramundane dharmas,

original: da dung skyes bu dam pa la legs par brten pa'am /
analyzed: da dung skyes bu dam pa la legs par brten pa'am /
translated: but has not yet relied on a holy person,

original: brten nas dam pa'i chos nyan pa'am /
analyzed: brten nas dam pa'i chos nyan pa'am /
translated: or having relied on him, has not listened to the true Dharma,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pa thob pa ma yin zhing /🔽tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pa thob pa ma yin zhing / tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi byed /
translated: or having listened to it, has not acquired faith in the discipline taught by the Tathagata,🔽or having acquired faith, does not take up morality,

original: thos pa 'dzin par mi byed /🔽gtong ba spel bar mi byed /
analyzed: thos pa 'dzin par mi byed / gtong ba spel bar mi byed /
translated: or having taken up morality, does not retain the teaching,🔽or having retained it, does not increase generosity,

original: lta ba sbyor bar mu byed pa yin @9a * //
analyzed: lta ba sbyor bar mu byed pa yin @9a * //
translated: or having increased generosity, does not apply himself to the view,🔽and so on up to:

original: te ; de ni rigs la gnas pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: te ; de ni rigs la gnas pa kho na yin la /
translated: This person is only situated in the spiritual lineage,

original: ma zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yin no //
analyzed: ma zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yin no //
translated: but has not entered the stages and has not attained certainty.

original: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is it to be established in the lineage, to have entered, but not to have definitely emerged?

original: sngar bshad pa'i nag po'i phyogs las bzlog pa dkar po'i phyogs la rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i nag po'i phyogs las bzlog pa dkar po'i phyogs la rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par ma byung ba yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that it is the opposite of the dark side explained above. It is the bright side, to be established in the lineage, to have entered, but not to have definitely emerged.

original: bye brag ni 'phags pa'i lam dang de'i 'bras bu nyan mongs pa dang bral ba ma thob pa yid do //
analyzed: bye brag ni 'phags pa'i lam dang de'i 'bras bu nyan mongs pa dang bral ba ma thob pa yid do //
translated: The difference is that one has not attained the noble path and the result of the path, which is freedom from the defilements.

original: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rigs la gnas la zhugs shing nges par byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is it to be established in the lineage, to have entered, and to have definitely emerged?

original: de dag gnyis brjod nas /
analyzed: de dag gnyis brjod nas /
translated: Having mentioned these two,

original: bye brag ni 'phags pa'i lam dang / de'i 'bras bu nyon mongs pa dang bral ba thob par bya ba de yod do //
analyzed: bye brag ni 'phags pa'i lam dang / de'i 'bras bu nyon mongs pa dang bral ba thob par bya ba de yod do //
translated: the difference is that one has attained the noble path and the result of the path, which is freedom from the defilements.

original: de la dbang po rtul po gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dbang po rtul po gang zhe na /
translated: What is it to be of dull faculties?

original: gang zag ces bya ba'i dngos po dmigs pa la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang zag ces bya ba'i dngos po dmigs pa la 'di lta ste /
translated: It is the state of a person who is slow in the acquisition of the Dharma, who is slow in the penetration of the principles of the Dharma, and who is slow in the realization of the fruit of the religious life.

original: thos pa las byung ba dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dbang po dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dag shin tu bul bar 'jug cing dal bar 'jug la /
analyzed: thos pa las byung ba dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dbang po dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dag shin tu bul bar 'jug cing dal bar 'jug la /
translated: It is the faculties of faith, effort, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom that are associated with the attention derived from listening, reflection, and meditation. They are very slow and sluggish in engaging their objects.

original: chos dang don rab tu 'byed pa dang / myur ba dang / de kho na rab tu 'byed par yang mi nus shing mthu med pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: chos dang don rab tu 'byed pa dang / myur ba dang / de kho na rab tu 'byed par yang mi nus shing mthu med pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: They are not able to discern phenomena and meanings quickly and with power.

original: de ni gang zag dbang po rtul po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag dbang po rtul po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the person of dull faculties.

original: de la dbang po 'bring gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dbang po 'bring gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person of middling faculties?

original: shes bya'i dngos po dmigs pa la dbang po rnams shin tu bul shing dal bar 'jug pa ma yin par thams cad snga ma bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: shes bya'i dngos po dmigs pa la dbang po rnams shin tu bul shing dal bar 'jug pa ma yin par thams cad snga ma bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the faculties that are not very slow and sluggish in engaging their objects, which are the things that are known. All the rest is to be described in detail as above.

original: de ni gang zag dbang po 'bring zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag dbang po 'bring zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the person of middling faculties.

original: gang zag dbang po rnon po gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag dbang po rnon po gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person of sharp faculties?

original: gang zag shes bya'i dngos po dmigs pa la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang zag shes bya'i dngos po dmigs pa la 'di lta ste /
translated: It is a person who, with regard to the object of knowledge, the object of perception,

original: thos pa las byung dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dbang po //
analyzed: thos pa las byung dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dbang po //
translated: is endowed with the mental application that arises from listening, reflection and meditation,

original: dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dag bu la ba ma yin par 'jug cing dal ba ma yin par 'jug la /
analyzed: dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dag bu la ba ma yin par 'jug cing dal ba ma yin par 'jug la /
translated: and who is endowed with the faculties of faith, vigor, mindfulness, concentration and wisdom, which are not sluggish, not slow,

original: chos dang don rab tu 'byed pa dang / myur ba dang / de kho na rab tu 'byed par yang nus shing mthu yod par gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: chos dang don rab tu 'byed pa dang / myur ba dang / de kho na rab tu 'byed par yang nus shing mthu yod par gang yin pa ste /
translated: and which are capable of discerning the teaching and its meaning quickly and of discerning reality.

original: de ni gang zag dbang po rngon po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag dbang po rngon po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called a person of sharp faculties.

original: gang zag @9b 'dod chags spyad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag @9b 'dod chags spyad pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person given to passion?

original: chags par 'gyur pa'i dmigs pa la 'dod chags drag po dang 'dod chags yun ring por 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: chags par 'gyur pa'i dmigs pa la 'dod chags drag po dang 'dod chags yun ring por 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is a person in whom, with regard to the object of passion, there is a strong and long-lasting passion.

original: de ni gang zag 'dod chags spyad pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag 'dod chags spyad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the person who is dominated by attachment.

original: gang zag zhe sdang spyad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag zhe sdang spyad pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person who is dominated by aversion?

original: zhe sdang bar 'gyur pa khong khro ba dang mthun pa'i dmigs pa la zhe sdang drag po dang zhe sdang yun ring po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: zhe sdang bar 'gyur pa khong khro ba dang mthun pa'i dmigs pa la zhe sdang drag po dang zhe sdang yun ring po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the person in whom aversion appears strongly and for a long time with regard to an object that provokes aversion and anger.

original: de ni gang zag zhe sdang spyad pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag zhe sdang spyad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the person who is dominated by aversion.

original: gang zag gti mug spyad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag gti mug spyad pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the person who is dominated by delusion?

original: shes bya'i dngos po la gti mug drag po dang gti mug yun ring po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: shes bya'i dngos po la gti mug drag po dang gti mug yun ring po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the person in whom delusion appears strongly and for a long time with regard to an object of knowledge.

original: de ni gang zag gti mug spyad pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag gti mug spyad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the person who is dominated by delusion.

original: gang zag mi khom bar skyes pa dang / bag med pa dang ldan pa dang / log par zhugs pa dang / bsgribs pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag mi khom bar skyes pa dang / bag med pa dang ldan pa dang / log par zhugs pa dang / bsgribs pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: The person who is born in an unfavorable state of existence, the person who is careless, the person who is wrongly informed and the person who is obscured should be understood as above.

original: de dag las bzlog pa ni khom par skyes pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa dang / log pa ma yin par zhugs pa dang / ma sgribs pa dag yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag las bzlog pa ni khom par skyes pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa dang / log pa ma yin par zhugs pa dang / ma sgribs pa dag yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The opposite of these four types of persons is the person who is born in a favorable situation, who is endowed with conscientiousness, who has entered the right path, and who is not obscured.

original: gang zag yun ring ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag yun ring ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who is slow?

original: gang zag dus ring bas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba yang yod do //
analyzed: gang zag dus ring bas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba yang yod do //
translated: There is a person who attains nirvana after a long time, because of the length of time.

original: sbyor ba yun ring bas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba yang yod do //
analyzed: sbyor ba yun ring bas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba yang yod do //
translated: There is a person who attains nirvana after a long time, because of the length of his practice.

original: de la dus yun ring bas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dus yun ring bas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who attains nirvana after a long time, because of the length of time?

original: tshe rabs brgya phrag du ma dag dang / tshe rabs stong phrag du ma dag dang / tshe rab 'bum phrag du ma dag gi 'og tu 'dod rkyen rnyed nas /
analyzed: tshe rabs brgya phrag du ma dag dang / tshe rabs stong phrag du ma dag dang / tshe rab 'bum phrag du ma dag gi 'og tu 'dod rkyen rnyed nas /
translated: He is a person who has not acquired the conditions for attaining nirvana in many hundreds of lives, in many thousands of lives, in many hundreds of thousands of lives.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal pa yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal pa yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is a person who has the opportunity to attain nirvana after a long time.

original: sbyor ba yun ring pas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba yun ring pas mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who attains nirvana after a long time, because of the length of his practice?

original: gang zag rigs la gnas pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: gang zag rigs la gnas pa kho na yin la /
translated: The person who is a candidate for the fruit of stream-enterer is a person who is in the lineage of the sravaka.

original: ma zhugs pa gang yin te /
analyzed: ma zhugs pa gang yin te /
translated: The person who is not a candidate is a person who is not in the lineage of the sravaka.

original: de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rkyen myur du 'thob pa'i skal yod pa yin no //🔽de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir sbyor ba ma brtsams pa tsam du zad pas sbyor bas yun ring ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rkyen myur du 'thob pa'i skal yod pa yin no // de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir sbyor ba ma brtsams pa tsam du zad pas sbyor bas yun ring ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' ba yun ring ba yin gyi /
translated: He is a person who has the fortune to quickly obtain the condition for attaining nirvana.🔽He is a person who has not begun the practice for the sake of attaining nirvana.

original: dus yun ring bas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dus yun ring bas ni ma yin te /
translated: He is a person who is far from nirvana because of the length of time required for the practice, but not because of the length of time required for the attainment.

original: de dag ni gang zag yun ring ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni gang zag yun ring ba zhes bya'o //
translated: These are the persons who are far from nirvana.

original: gang zag thag nye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag thag nye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who is near?

original: gang zag dus thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba yang yod do //🔽sbyor @10a * //
analyzed: gang zag dus thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba yang yod do // sbyor @10a * //
translated: There is a person who is near to nirvana because of being near to the time of nirvana.

original: ba thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba yang yod do //
analyzed: ba thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba yang yod do //
translated: There is a person who is near to nirvana because of being near to the practice.

original: de la dus thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dus thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who is near to nirvana because of being near to the time of nirvana?

original: lus dang gnas kyi dngos po tha mal la gnas shing de lus de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / skad cig de la bar chad med par nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon sum du byed pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: lus dang gnas kyi dngos po tha mal la gnas shing de lus de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / skad cig de la bar chad med par nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon sum du byed pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: He is called one who attains Nirvana with effort because he attains Nirvana with effort.🔽What is one who attains Nirvana without effort?

original: de ni dus nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni dus nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba yin no //
translated: He is one who is in the lineage, who has entered the certainty of perfection, and who attains Nirvana without effort.🔽He is called one who attains Nirvana without effort because he attains Nirvana without effort.

original: sbyor ba thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba thag nye bas mya ngan las 'da' ba thag nye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is one who goes upstream?🔽He is one who is in the lineage, who has entered the certainty of perfection, and who is bound for the highest stage.🔽He is called one who goes upstream because he goes upstream to the highest stage.🔽What is one who is bound for the middle?

original: de ni rigs la gnas shing zhugs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de ni rigs la gnas shing zhugs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: He is one who is in the lineage, who has entered the certainty of perfection, and who is bound for the middle stage.

original: de dag gcig tu bsdus pa ni gang zag thag nye ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gcig tu bsdus pa ni gang zag thag nye ba zhes bya'o //
translated: He is called one who is bound for the middle because he is bound for the middle stage.

original: gang zag yongs su ma smin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag yongs su ma smin pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is one who is bound for the lower?

original: gang zag gang la gnas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus phyi ma thob pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gang zag gang la gnas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus phyi ma thob pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: He is one who is in the lineage, who has entered the certainty of perfection, and who is bound for the lower stage.

original: de ni gang zag yongs sum smin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag yongs sum smin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: He is called one who is bound for the lower because he is bound for the lower stage.

original: gang zag yongs su smin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag yongs su smin pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who is completely mature?

original: gang zag gang la gnas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur pa'i tha ma'i lus phyi ma thob pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gang zag gang la gnas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur pa'i tha ma'i lus phyi ma thob pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is a person who has obtained a final existence in which he will enter into the certainty of perfection and attain Nirvana.

original: de ni gang zag rnam par dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de ni gang zag rnam par dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who is completely pure?

original: de las bzlog pa yin par rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa yin par rigs par bya'o //
translated: It is the opposite of the preceding.

original: de dag zhe na /🔽gang zag 'phags pa'i lam ma bskyed cing /🔽de'i 'bras bu nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon sum du ma byas pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de dag zhe na / gang zag 'phags pa'i lam ma bskyed cing / de'i 'bras bu nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon sum du ma byas pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: What is a person who is not completely pure?

original: de ni gang zag rnam par ma dag pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gang zag rnam par ma dag pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is a person who has not produced the noble path and who has not manifested the result of the noble path, i.e., the detachment from the defilements.

original: gang zag rnam par dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag rnam par dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a person who is completely pure?

original: de las bzlog pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It is the opposite of the preceding.

original: de dag ni rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de dag ni rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams zhes bya ste /
translated: These are the persons who are established in the spiritual lineages.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What are they?

original: ma zhugs pa rnams gzhug par bya ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par ma dag pa rnams rnam par dag par bya ba gang dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung zhing /
analyzed: ma zhugs pa rnams gzhug par bya ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par ma dag pa rnams rnam par dag par bya ba gang dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung zhing /
translated: The Bhagavan Buddhas appear in the world for the sake of those who have not entered the vehicle, to cause them to enter, for the sake of those who have not matured their mind, to cause them to mature it, and for the sake of those who have not purified their mind, to cause them to purify it.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo dag bskyod bar mdzad pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'cha' bar mdzad pa dag yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo dag bskyod bar mdzad pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'cha' bar mdzad pa dag yin no //
translated: They turn the wheel of the Dharma and establish the bases of training.

original: bar gyi sdom ni /
analyzed: bar gyi sdom ni /
translated: The intermediate summary:

original: rang bzhin dang ni de rnams gzhag / rtags rnams dang ni gang zag dag / de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang ni de rnams gzhag / rtags rnams dang ni gang zag dag / de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te /
translated: The nature, their establishment, the signs, the persons, all of that is summarized

original: rigs @10b kyi sar ni shes par bya //
analyzed: rigs @10b kyi sar ni shes par bya //
translated: and should be known on the level of lineage.

original: nyan thos kyi sa las rigs kyi sa rdzogs so /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa las rigs kyi sa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the level of lineage in the Sravaka Levels.

original: // / de la 'jug pa'i sa gang zhe na /
analyzed: // / de la 'jug pa'i sa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the level of engagement?

original: smras pa / 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / rnam par gzhag la gang yin pa dang / zhugs pa'i gang zag gi rtags gang dag yin pa dang / zhugs pa'i gang zag gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gcig ti bsdus pa ni 'jug pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: smras pa / 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / rnam par gzhag la gang yin pa dang / zhugs pa'i gang zag gi rtags gang dag yin pa dang / zhugs pa'i gang zag gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gcig ti bsdus pa ni 'jug pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
translated: He said: The nature of engagement, that which is established, the signs of the person who has engaged, and the persons who have engaged—all of these are included in the level of engagement.

original: de la 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of engagement?

original: 'di la rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sa bon gyi chos dang ldan pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di la rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sa bon gyi chos dang ldan pa de ni /
translated: Here, a person who is established in the lineage and who possesses the qualities that are the seeds of nirvāṇa,🔽when a buddha appears, is born in a central land, is not a fool, and is not a barbarian, and so on, as before.

original: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod cing yul dbus kyi mi rkun ma ma yin pa dang dang / kla klo ma yin pa rnams su rgyas par snga ma bzhin du skyes par gyur nas dang po kho na sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la lta ba dang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod cing yul dbus kyi mi rkun ma ma yin pa dang dang / kla klo ma yin pa rnams su rgyas par snga ma bzhin du skyes par gyur nas dang po kho na sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la lta ba dang /
translated: At the very beginning, he meets the buddhas and the disciples of the buddhas,

original: drung du 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: drung du 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: sees them, goes into their presence, and serves them.

original: de dag las chos thos nas dang por dad pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / gtong pa spel ba dang / lta ba sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: de dag las chos thos nas dang por dad pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / gtong pa spel ba dang / lta ba sbyong bar byed do //
translated: Having heard the Dharma from them, they first attain faith, take up moral discipline, retain what they have heard, increase their generosity, and purify their view.

original: de'i 'og tu chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig cing tshe de yang dag par 'das nas kyang /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig cing tshe de yang dag par 'das nas kyang /
translated: After that, due to that cause and condition of having taken up the Dharma, when their body disintegrates and their life ends,

original: rnam par smin pa'i skye mched drug gis zin pa'i dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur zhing /🔽de'i de dag kyang dad pa shin tu mchog rnams dang / shin tu gtso bo dag skye ba'i rten du 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa dang / thos pa gzung ba dang / gtong ba spel ba dang / lta ba sbyangs pa shin tu mchog dang /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i skye mched drug gis zin pa'i dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de'i de dag kyang dad pa shin tu mchog rnams dang / shin tu gtso bo dag skye ba'i rten du 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa dang / thos pa gzung ba dang / gtong ba spel ba dang / lta ba sbyangs pa shin tu mchog dang /
translated: they attain faculties that are superior to the six sense bases that are the result of karmic maturation.

original: gtso bo dang / dam par gyur pa dag gi rten du gyur par yang 'gyur to //
analyzed: gtso bo dang / dam par gyur pa dag gi rten du gyur par yang 'gyur to //
translated: Those faculties become the basis for the arising of the most supreme and foremost faith, and they also become the basis for the most supreme, foremost, and pure taking up of moral discipline, retaining what they have heard, increasing generosity, and purifying their view.

original: dad pa la sogs pa'i chos shin tu mchog dang / gtso ba dang / dam par gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang yang rnam par smin pa gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa'i chos shin tu mchog dang / gtso ba dang / dam par gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang yang rnam par smin pa gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur zhing /
translated: The qualities of faith and so on are the most supreme, the most excellent, and the most sublime.

original: rnam par smin pa de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba gzhan dag gi rten du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba gzhan dag gi rten du 'gyur te /
translated: They are the basis for other fruitions, and that fruition is the basis for other virtues that are in harmony with supramundane qualities.

original: de ltar gcig gi rgyu dang rten du gcig gyur pa'i sbyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas /🔽gong nas gong du gang la gnas na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / @11a * //
analyzed: de ltar gcig gi rgyu dang rten du gcig gyur pa'i sbyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas / gong nas gong du gang la gnas na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / @11a * //
translated: In this way, the power of generosity becomes the cause and basis for one thing after another.🔽It is the basis for the attainment of the next best rebirth, and it is the basis for the attainment of the final body, in which one will attain nirvana and enter into the certainty of perfect enlightenment.

original: yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus phi ma thob pa'i bar gyi kye ba khyad par can du 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus phi ma thob pa'i bar gyi kye ba khyad par can du 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is what is called “engagement.”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de de'i tshe na mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba dang ; rim gyis 'gro bar bya ba dang / shin tu mthar thug par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de de'i tshe na mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba dang ; rim gyis 'gro bar bya ba dang / shin tu mthar thug par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: At that time, in order to attain nirvana, to proceed to nirvana, to proceed gradually, and to reach the ultimate,🔽
